beer.name: John's Locker Stock: Markus Brau
beer.description: The aroma is pleasantly grainy-sweet, the color is topaz hued, and the flavor is malty with low hop bitterness that supports the malty palate. Lagered 5 weeks.
beer.grains: Durst Pilsner, Great Western Munich, Weyermann Carahell.
Durst Pilsner, Great Western Munich, Weyermann Carahell.
beer.hops: US Perle, Newport, German Spalt Select.
